Package suncertify.db

This package makes up the persistence layer of the application.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DBMain  
    DBMainExtended
    DBMainExtended extends DBMain, the common interface for any data access objects in the persistence layer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Data
    Data is an implementation of the DBMainExtended which acts as a DAO for a non-relation database file.
    DatabaseFactory
    A factory for retrieving and initializing a single instance of a data access object for the specified database file.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DatabaseAccessException
    The class DatabaseAccessException is thrown when the database file that is selected does not exist or the database file could not be read for some IO related reason.
    DuplicateKeyException
    The class DuplicateKeyException is thrown when attempting to add a new entry to the database if the database already contains an entry, which hasn't been marked as deleted, with the same primary key.
    RecordNotFoundException
    The class RecordNotFoundException is thrown when trying to perform a database operation a record which does not exist or has been marked as deleted in the database.

Package suncertify.db Description

This package makes up the persistence layer of the application. It contains a group of classes used to query from and persist to a non-relational database file. It is responsible for passing data between the services and database layer of the application.
